EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-10-10 Unlock Cloud Elasticity to Lower Cloud Bills - Live Demo.Thanks f
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=Our Webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining our webinar on {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}}.
You can watch it again on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-cloud-eq/]]>.
If you'd like to learn more about how to unleash cloud elasticity, check out our newest whitepaper on Deploying and Managing Microsoft Azure IaaS Solutions here <[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/]]>.
We hope you enjoy the recording! -Team Turbonomic
